Cart_Note_SalesTax: Sales tax will be calculated during checkout where applicable
Cart_GiftDelivery_Now: As soon as possible (via email and Steam Client)
Cart_FamilyGift_Notice: Gifts sent to children in your Steam Family will be automatically added to their account and their allowed games.
Cart_GiftRecipientModal_IssueLoading: There was a problem loading eligible gift recipients. Please try again later.
Cart_RequestPurchaseExplanation: The adults in your Steam Family will be notified of your purchase request
Cart_RequestPurchaseNonGiftableItems: Cannot request purchase because not all items in the cart are giftable
Cart_CouponAvailability: You have a coupon available for this item
Cart_CouponAvailability_Plural: You have %1$s coupons available for this item
Cart_SelectCouponToApply: Select a coupon to apply to %1$s
Cart_Error_AlreadyOwned_FootNote: Your account already owns some of the above items, so you can’t purchase them again. You can purchase these items as a gift or adjust the contents of your cart to continue.
Cart_Error_AlreadyOwned_LineItem: You already own everything in this package
Cart_Error_AlreadyOwned_GiftLineItem_Gam: The gift recipient already owns this game
Cart_Error_AlreadyOwned_GiftLineItem: The gift recipient already owns everything in this package
Cart_Error_AlreadyOwned_GiftFootNote: The gift recipient already owns some of the above items, so you can’t purchase them again. You can purchase these items for a different account or adjust the contents of your cart to continue.
Cart_Error_DuplicateApps_FootNote: It looks like you have packages which overlap in your cart. You need to remove the redundant packages from your cart before you can checkout.
Cart_Error_UnavailableCountry_FootNote: Your cart contains a package that is unavailable in your country. You need to remove the package from your cart before you can checkout.
Cart_Error_MasterSubscription_FootNote: Your cart contains content that is also available through one of your active subscriptions.
Cart_Error_CouponIsExclusivePromo: This coupon cannot be used in conjunction with another discount.
Cart_Error_CouponIsInvalid: This coupon is invalid or otherwise expired.
Cart_Error_CouponIsInvalidForItem: This coupon cannot be applied to this item.
Cart_Error_TooManyInCart: You have exceeded the maximum quantity of this item allowed in your cart.
Cart_Error_MissingMustOwnApps_LineItem: Purchasing this item requires you own the following items:
Cart_Error_MissingMustOwnApps_GiftLineIt: This item requires the gift recipient own the following items:
Cart_Error_MissingMustOwnApps_FootNote: Your account doesn't own some items that are required for purchasing the items in your cart.  You can add the missing items or adjust the contents of your cart to continue.
Cart_Error_MissingMustOwnApps_FootNoteGi: The gift recipient doesn't own some items that are required for purchasing the items in your cart.  You can add the missing items or adjust the contents of your cart to continue.
Cart_Error_ExistingBillingAgreement: You already have a subscription for this item.
Cart_Error_ExistingBillingAgreement_Foot: Your account already has a subscription for some of the above items.  View your subscription settings in your account details.
Cart_Warning_AlreadyOwned_LineItem: If purchasing for yourself, you will not receive an extra copy of:
Cart_Warning_ExtraCopies_LineItem: If purchasing for yourself, you will receive an extra, giftable copy of:
Cart_Warning_PriceChange_FootNote: Note: One or more of the items below have changed in price since you added it to your cart.
Cart_Warning_PriceChange_LineItem: The price of this item has changed
Cart_Warning_NoRefund_LineItem: This product contains consumable content that makes it not eligible for a refund.

Cart_Notice_SomeAppsPrivate: Some of these items are already marked as private. They will remain private if you continue:
Cart_LineItemOptions_PrivateTooltip: Marking a game as private will hide it everywhere outside of your Library. Your ownership, in-game status, playtime, and activity will not be visible to other people.
Cart_BetaNotice: You're seeing a new version of the shopping cart because you're participating in the Steam Client Beta. <1>Leave feedback or report bugs</1>

Cart_ErrorUpdating: There was a problem updating your cart.
Cart_Replay_Instructions: This is a saved shopping cart.  Last time you attempted to purchase this cart there was an error, so we saved your cart (including discounts) for %1$s hours so you can attempt your purchase again.
